title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, push, list, copy, delete models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama: same API surface as Python but for Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: chat, embeddings, tool-calling, structured output, batching.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: sync/async, streaming, model management, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Unofficial Ruby gem for Ollama: simple API wrapper with streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI for Ollama: chat from your terminal with history, syntax highlighting, keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement: inline suggestions, chat panel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes: GPU support, PVC, ingress, autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Next.js chat UI for Ollama: TypeScript, Tailwind, Docker, one-click deploy to Vercel.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for Ollama: LangChain, LlamaIndex, Autogen, HuggingFace transformers examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama: generator, embedder, chat node with pipeline YAML support.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama: async HTTP, streams, native JSON, zero dependencies outside stdlib.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama: generate, chat, embeddings, streams, model management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama: tokio-based, strong typing, streaming, embedders, model ops.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama: C# 12, IAsyncEnumerable streaming, dependency injection, minimal API sample.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client for Ollama: simple API, context cancellation, streaming, model utils.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Ollama: maintained list of 20+ language bindings.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot powered by Ollama: slash commands, thread chats, model picker, rate limits.
